snippet: Turn that obligatory cheese plate into something special this season with a pile of artisanal cheese and heaps of homemade thyme-and-sea-salt crackers.
abstract: Turn that obligatory cheese plate into something special this season with a pile of artisanal cheese and heaps of homemade thyme-and-sea-salt crackers.

byline.original: By JEFF SCHWARZ and GREG KESSLER

headline.main: A Chef in the Field | Artisanal Cheese (and Crackers to Go With It)
